thread.title: US stocks mostly flat as yuan and oil stabilize
thread.title_full: US stocks mostly flat as yuan and oil stabilize

title: US stocks mostly flat as yuan and oil stabilize
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Aug 14, 2015, 17:33 BST - UK Markets closed US stocks mostly flat as yuan and oil stabilize US stocks mostly flat as Chinese currency stabilizes and oil edges up from six-year low By Bernard Condon, AP Business Writer | Associated Press – 33 minutes ago View Photo 
FILE - In this Monday, July 6, 2015, file photo, a man uses a mobile phone while walking by a building … 
NEW YORK (AP) -- U.S. stocks are mostly flat in midday trading as China's currency stabilizes and oil edges up after hitting its lowest price in more than six years. 
The Dow Jones industrial average rose 41 points, or 0.2 percent, to 17,447 as of 11:57 a.m. Eastern time Friday. The Standard & Poor's 500 index rose three points to 2,086. 
The Nasdaq composite fell five points, or 0.1 percent, to 5,027. 
Applied Materials, a maker of equipment for chip companies, fell after the company gave a weak sales outlook. 
Nordstrom climbed after the department store chain reported earnings that were better than Wall Street analysts expected. 
The price of oil edged up from its lowest level in more than six years. 
Bond prices barely moved, keeping the yield on the 10-year Treasury note at 2.21 percent.
